XData.name: BPL
XData.Data: <process language='objectscript' request='Scan.CheckEmployeeRequest' response='Scan.CheckEmployeeResponse' height='2000' width='2000' > <context> <property name='Attributes' type='Scan.CheckEmployeeResponse' /> <property name='Action' type='%String' /> </context> <sequence xend='550' yend='1300' > <call name='Get Employee Info' target='Scan.GetEmployeeInfo' async='1' xpos='550' ypos='200' > <request type='Scan.CheckEmployeeRequest' > <assign property='callrequest' value='request' action='set' /> </request> <response type='Scan.CheckEmployeeResponse' > <assign property='response' value='callresponse' action='set' /> <assign property='context.Attributes' value='callresponse' action='set' /> </response> </call> <sync name='Wait For Response' calls='Get Employee Info' timeout='30' type='all' xpos='550' ypos='300' /> <if name='Blacklist?' condition=''context.Attributes.IsRelated & context.Attributes.IsExternal' xpos='550' ypos='400' xend='550' yend='1200' > <true> <call name='Call Owner' target='Owner' async='1' xpos='550' ypos='550' > <request type='EnsLib.Workflow.TaskRequest' > <assign property='callrequest.%Subject' value='"Review BlackList Email"' action='set' /> <assign property='callrequest.%Actions' value='"Allow Email,Fire Employee,Sue Employee"' action='set' /> <assign property='callrequest.%Message' value='request.ToAddress_"; "_request.EmailText' action='set' /> </request> <response type='EnsLib.Workflow.TaskResponse' > <assign property='context.Action' value='callresponse.%Action' action='set' /> </response> </call> <sync name='Wait for Workflow' calls='Call Owner' type='all' xpos='550' ypos='650' /> <if name='Check Action Taken' condition='context.Action="Allow Email"' xpos='550' ypos='750' xend='550' yend='1000' > <true> <call name='Blacklist File' target='Scan.MakeFileOperation' async='1' xpos='685' ypos='900' > <request type='Scan.EmailFileRequest' > <assign property='request.EmailText' value='context.Action_" "_request.EmailText' action='set' /> <assign property='callrequest.FileName' value='"BlackList.txt"' action='set' /> <assign property='callrequest.Contents' value='request' action='set' /> </request> </call> </true> </if> </true> <false> <transform name='Update data' class='Scan.ChangeForSafeEmailDTL' source='request' target='request' xpos='1090' ypos='550' /> <call name='Call Manager' target='Manager' async='1' xpos='1090' ypos='650' > <request type='EnsLib.Workflow.TaskRequest' > <assign property='callrequest.%Subject' value='"Check email for "_request.Name' action='set' /> <assign property='callrequest.%Message' value='request.EmailText' action='set' /> <assign property='callrequest.%Actions' value='"Approve Email,Contact Employee"' action='set' /> </request> <response type='EnsLib.Workflow.TaskResponse' > <assign property='context.Action' value='callresponse.%Action' action='set' /> </response> </call> <sync name='Wait for Workflow' calls='Call Manager' type='all' xpos='1090' ypos='750' /> <if name='Check Action Taken' condition='context.Action="Approve Email"' xpos='1090' ypos='850' xend='1090' yend='1100' > <true> <call name='Safe Email File' target='Scan.MakeFileOperation' async='1' xpos='1360' ypos='1000' > <request type='Scan.EmailFileRequest' > <assign property='callrequest.FileName' value='"SafeEmail.txt"' action='set' /> <assign property='callrequest.Contents' value='request' action='set' /> </request> </call> </true> <false> <empty name='Not Yet Implemnted' xpos='1090' ypos='1000' /> </false> </if> </false> </if> </sequence> </process>
